name: Firo
public_notice: Zcoin has rebranded to Firo, read more here. Note that certain exchanges may not have changed their tickers from XZC to FIRO yet. Please double confirm with the exchanges prior to moving your funds.

description.en:
Firo - formerly known as Zcoin, is a privacy-focused cryptocurrency that deploys zero-knowledge proofs to ensure fully anonymous transactions. It works by allowing users to destroy coins and then redeem later for brand new ones with no transaction history.Â 

Firo differs from the other privacy-centric coins in the market in that it does not merely obfuscate payment trails, but rather, works to abolish them.Â 

Its operation is backed by the Lelantus privacy protocol, which is an upgrade from standard cryptographic assumptions, supporting high anonymity sets without requiring â€˜trusted setupâ€™.Â 

Firoâ€™s operations are also backed by Dandelion++ which conceals the originating IP of transactions, removing the need for external services such as Tor or i2P.Â 

The Firo/Zcoin blockchain was used in the Thai Democrat Party Elections in 2018 to elect its party leader with over 127,000+ votes cast nationwide making it the first wide-scale application of blockchain technology in a political election.

description.ar:
Firo - formerly known as Zcoin, is a privacy-focused cryptocurrency that deploys zero-knowledge proofs to ensure fully anonymous transactions. It works by allowing users to destroy coins and then redeem later for brand new ones with no transaction history.Â 

Firo differs from the other privacy-centric coins in the market in that it does not merely obfuscate payment trails, but rather, works to abolish them.Â 

Its operation is backed by the Lelantus privacy protocol, which is an upgrade from standard cryptographic assumptions, supporting high anonymity sets without requiring â€˜trusted setupâ€™.Â 

Firoâ€™s operations are also backed by Dandelion++ which conceals the originating IP of transactions, removing the need for external services such as Tor or i2P.Â 

The Firo/Zcoin blockchain was used in the Thai Democrat Party Elections in 2018 to elect its party leader with over 127,000+ votes cast nationwide making it the first wide-scale application of blockchain technology in a political election.

status_updates.description:
Firo v0.14.12.0 Mandatory Update ğŸ› 

âœ… This is a mandatory update extending emergency switch support for 1 more year and fixes some bugs

â—ï¸Please update before block 608035 (approximately 14 January, 4pm UTC). Updating after this block will require a reindex

ğŸ‘‰ https://github.com/firoorg/firo/releases/tag/v0.14.12.0

We're going live with Reuben Yap of Firo and Joel Valenzuela on Living on crypto & the freedom of exchange on DecredMagazine! Drop by and ask some questions!

https://www.youtube.com/live/riW1HbhfoIw

ğŸ”’ Privacy matters. ğŸ”‘ Firo is the ultimate privacy-focused cryptocurrency with its advanced privacy protocol Lelantus and the upcoming Lelantus Spark, ensuring secure, untraceable transactions and the privacy of your assets.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SYfsEDYLa8A

Here is the section of Aram Jivanyan at MoneroKon covering Lelantus Spark & Seraphis! This is the video you want to watch if you want the meat and potatoes of how Lelantus Spark operates! 

ğŸ¥: https://youtu.be/wl4urDoQqwY?t=2748

If you missed it, check out this recording of Aaron Feickert at #MoneroKon presenting, Spats: User-defined Confidential Assets and Tokens.

https://youtu.be/YSlK8yqc6Oc?t=1752

Catch Aram Jivanyan at Monerokon where he will be presenting Lelantus Spark at 4 p.m. Prague Time!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AR5QeXKSuY8
